issue.title: [C++] Add Equals method to Partitioning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16911](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16911). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In writing an `Equals` method for `FileSystemDataset`, it is required to add an `Equals` method to `Partitioning`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16911?focusedCommentId=17568505) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13567
